name: Pendemonium
description:
Help! All the animals have escaped their pens!

Catch the animals and put them back. But before you go picking one up, remember that it's always best to toss them a bit of food to calm them first. And make sure to get the right combination of animals in each pen, otherwise it will be pure...Pendemonium!!!

This game was designed and created during a 48 hour period for SamJam 2017. As such there are plenty of bugs present and audio is nonexistent. Art by @Samizabeth. Code by @matthewrmilson.

Keyboard Controls:

  • Space - pick up and drop items/start game
  • WSAD/Arrow Keys - movement
  • ESC - close the game

Gamepad Controls:

  • A Button  -  pick up and drop items/start game
  • L-Stick - movement
  • ESC - close the game
